name: BabyMagica
description:
BabyMagica is a educational game for 2 year olds with colourful graphics, the animated animals for kids and cheerful children's music. The application includes 3 fun games for kids.

🐹 In the toddler game "Little Squirrel" it is necessary to help a little squirrel and a hedgehog to gather nutlets and mushrooms and also to decorate a clearing with flowers.
This game is for the little kids 2-3 year old.

🌞 In the children game "Happy Sun" under fervent kids music it is possible to burst fluffy clouds, finding various prizes, funny animals; to treat the sun with sweets and fruit, to dress up and think out to it different images; to launch a salute into the night sky and to collect constellations - puzzles for kids (puzzles for toddlers).
This educational game is for kids 2 years and older.

🚂 In the fun game for kids "Train for Animals" it is necessary to transport all animals on stations, eliminating obstacles in engine transits.
The baby train can change colors, hoot in a whistle and start up multi-colored smoke.
And with each animal at the station it is possible to play: the hedgehog can gather musical apples; the greyish hare to gnaw carrot and to giggle cheerfully; boar catches acorns in a bag; the elephant to start up confetti and balloon pop; the monkey to blow soap bubbles (bubble pop); the cat to purr; the young fox to dance, the dog to catch a bone, the crocodile to play a ball and so forth.
This educational game is for kids 3 years and older.

EDUCATIONAL GAMES FOR KIDS

The game is designed for the little children and toddlers.
The kids app contains both entertaining elements: train for kids, animals for kids, animal sounds, colorful balls, bubbles for kids, balloon game, cars, airplanes, and simple puzzles for toddlers. The child will spend time not only with pleasure, but also with benefit (training attention, logic, memory, fine motor skills and reaction).

INFORMATION FOR PARENTS

Game for little children will be interesting both to boys, and girls aged from 2 up to 5 years. Each child will find in her for himself a lot of fascinating and interesting.
BabyMagica game is calculated on an independent research by the child of the game world. She contributes to the development of creative abilities, the interest of the child in the nature, animals and the world and also development of ingenuity, memory, attention, thinking, reaction and also sense of humour.
Parents can have a rest or go about the own business and to be sure that a game is safe for the child. In her there is no advertizing and any additional purchases, there are no transitions to the social networks and so forth.

FEATURES OF THE APPLICATION

• the kids app includes 3 fun games!
• BabyMagica is designed for children aged from 2 up to 5 years.
• intuitively simple management, - contact with one finger. Will be ideal for kids and toddlers!
• kids games aren't limited on time and have no account, points and so forth everything will be clear to the Child!
• interactivity of characters, responsiveness and realness of the game world contributes to the development of imagination of the child, curiosity, sense of humour.
• children game gives the chance to the child to invent the story on the game course.
• we regularly update the kids app and we add new content to mini-games. The child will be able to come back again and again to a game, always opening for himself something brand new.
• a game for little kids is got once and has no additional purchases.
• we carefully watch stability of operation of application, quality of a game.
